gloss: the act of accepting with approval; favorable reception
a counter (as in a hotel) where guests are received
register formally as a participant or member
(of a state or an event) taking place without something specified occurring at the same time

a mental position from which things are viewed
an event in which one thing is substituted for another
a loss of polarity or polarization
boldly resisting authority or an opposing force
(anthropology) kinship by marriage or adoption; not a blood relationship
a reaction that has been acquired by learning
